original_title: The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald: The Legend of Grimace Island
overview: The plot features Ronald and the gang out on a journey to Grimace Island where Grimace's species is discovered. Grimace previously received a letter which was actually written by the pirate captain One-Eyed Sally and her first mate Blather. The two pirates follow them to capture the treasure on the island.
title: The Wacky Adventures of Ronald McDonald: The Legend of Grimace Island
